name: Shapes In Space 3D
description:
The third installment in the Shapes In Space series (the other two don't count.)

More Shapes, More Problems. Welcome to the Shapeverse.

See how long you can last against the other shapes!

I will continue development as maintainer practice, learning how to make things extensible and whatnot. 

Free! But holla holla get dolla I very much dislike my day job :)
